languages.text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас и не прекращая играть, Соломон тихо произносит:{/n} "Раньше я ни для кого не играл. Это — мой знак внимания".
{n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
languages.original_text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас и не прекращая играть, Соломон тихо произносит:{/n} "Раньше я ни для кого не играл. Это — мой знак внимания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
{n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
{n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
{n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
{n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは演奏を続けながら、ちらりとあなたに視線を送り、そっと打ち明けた。{/n}「誰かのために演奏したのは初めてです。これは私なりのアプローチなんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは演奏を続けながら、ちらりとあなたに視線を送り、そっと打ち明けた。{/n}「誰かのために演奏したのは初めてです。これは私なりのアプローチなんです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne blickt dich von der Seite an, während du weiterspielst, und gesteht dann leise:{/n} "Ich habe noch nie für jemand anderen gespielt. Ich mache Euch hiermit sozusagen Avancen."
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne blickt dich von der Seite an, während du weiterspielst, und gesteht dann leise:{/n} "Ich habe noch nie für jemand anderen gespielt. Ich mache Euch hiermit sozusagen Avancen."

languages.text: {n}Sans cesser de jouer, Solomorne vous adresse un regard en coin et avoue à mots couverts :{/n} « Je n'avais encore jamais joué pour qui que ce soit. C'est ma façon à moi de vous déclarer ma flamme. »
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans cesser de jouer, Solomorne vous adresse un regard en coin et avoue à mots couverts :{/n} « Je n'avais encore jamais joué pour qui que ce soit. C'est ma façon à moi de vous déclarer ma flamme. »

languages.text: {n}Mirándote de soslayo sin dejar de tocar, Solomorne confiesa en voz baja:{/n} «Nunca antes había tocado para nadie. Esta es mi forma de insinuarme a usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirándote de soslayo sin dejar de tocar, Solomorne confiesa en voz baja:{/n} «Nunca antes había tocado para nadie. Esta es mi forma de insinuarme a usted».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙一边瞥了你一眼，一边继续演奏。随后，他平静地坦白道。{/n}“这首曲子我从来没给任何人演奏过，这就是我‘示好’的方式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙一边瞥了你一眼，一边继续演奏。随后，他平静地坦白道。{/n}“这首曲子我从来没给任何人演奏过，这就是我‘示好’的方式。”

languages.text: {n}Sana yan gözle bakarken çalmayı sürdürüyor ve alçak sesle itirafta bulunuyor.{/n} "Daha önce kimse için çalmamıştım. Uvertürlerimden biridir."
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana yan gözle bakarken çalmayı sürdürür ve alçak sesle itiraf eder.{/n} "Daha evvel kimse için çalmamıştım. Bu tasavvurlarımdan biridir."

languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a glance at you while continuing to play, Solomorne quietly confesses,{/n} "I have never played for anyone before. This is me making an overture."
